questions.question: Why are Gallery Apps commonly used?
options: As a way to create a collection of FME Server apps for people to use.
As a way to store apps outside of FME Server.
As an easy way to make apps public.
As a way to restrict access to certain apps.

questions.question: If a user doesnâ€™t have access to an FME Server App, but they have access to a Gallery App that contains it, what do they see?
options: They would see the FME Server App but they would be unable to access it.
They would not be able to see the FME Server App they do not have access to.
They would not have access to the Gallery App.
They would see an error on the Gallery App.
